verifyBoard(uint256,int256[]).details: Verify the opponent's board after the match is finished.Requires:         - The match ID must be valid and finished (according to modifiers).         - The sender must be a participant of the match.Emits:         - A matchFinished event if cheating is detected and rewards are transferred.         - A matchFinished event if the verification is successful and rewards are transferred.

params._cells: The array representing the opponent's board cells.
params._matchID: The ID of the finished match.

verifyBoard(uint256,int256[]).notice: This function allows a player to verify the opponent's board after a match is finished.         It checks if the board size matches the declared size and if the number of remaining ships         matches the declared number of ships. If cheating is detected, rewards are transferred.
